scripts.build-docker: echo Building the Exertive Angular Laboratory app for deployment to a Docker container. && ng build --configuration docker
scripts.build-image: echo Building the Docker image. && docker build -t exertive-angular-laboratory .
scripts.remove-image: echo Removing the Docker image. && docker rmi exertive-angular-laboratory
scripts.run-container: echo Running the Docker container exposing port 8080. && docker run --name exertive-angular-laboratory -d -p 8080:80 exertive-angular-laboratory
scripts.remove-container: echo Removing the Docker container. && docker rm -f exertive-angular-laboratory
scripts.containerize: echo Building the Docker image. && npm run build-image
scripts.recontainerize: echo Removing the Docker container and rebuilding. && npm run remove-container && npm run build-image
scripts.publish: az container create --resource-group exertive-application-resources --name exertive-angular-laboratory --image exertive/exertive-angular-laboratory:latest --os-type Linux --cpu 1 --memory 1.5 --ports 80
